fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit another player to steal 1 material from them.
- During the day, construct a fortress at your house out of 1, 2, 2.5, or 3 materials, raising your defense to Basic, Powerful, Powerful And A Half, or Invincible depending on how many materials you used, until the end of the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start the game with 3 materials.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.
